title: ‘I had half a bottle of wine for breakfast’: James Martin on shunning clean living and enjoying life

James Martin presented Saturday Kitchen for 10 years – so he definitely knows a thing or two about good food. 
The TV chef only bowed out of his role on the Saturday morning show last year after a decade. 
He now has a new daytime cookery show and book exploring his love affair with France. 
And now the 44 year old has revealed he has “no time for the clean-living craze” and would much rather tuck into rich French foods than down wheat grass shots. James Martin quit Saturday Kitchen after 10 years on the show (Photo: BBC) 
“I trained in some of the best restaurants in the world I’m not going to do that a disservice by cooking wheat grass!” he told Woman. 
“If you’re lecturing people you should be a nutritionist. The problem is these cooks – and they’re cooks, not chefs – just want to be famous so they’re lecturing people on what they should eat and it’s a dangerous game. 
“You won’t find a chef doing that. I had half a bottle of wine and a baguette with duck confit for breakfast!” James Martin cooking on This Morning (Photo: Rex Features) 
And James added that he doesn’t expect to have a “six pack” at his age. 
Earlier this month, James finally revealed the real reason he quit Saturday Kitchen. 
The TV chef bowed out of his role on the Saturday morning show last year after a decade. 
It was actually the sudden death of a stranger that made James reconsider his position on Saturday Kitchen. Read More Paul Hollywood 'spotted with trio of celebrity chefs at screen-test for GBBO spin-off' James Martin (Photo: Rex Features) 
After rumours that he was leaving because of budget cuts or to host Top Gear , James told Piers Morgan and Susanna Reid the truth on Good Morning Britain. 
“I was chatting to him and he stood up on stage and collapsed and passed away in front of me,” he said. “That was just over a year ago and that was the decision to change. 
“I look back at all the work I’d done, I’d done like four days off that year and five days off the year before and I thought something’s got to change. James Martin on 'Good Morning Britain' (Photo: Rex Features) James Martin on 'Good Morning Britain' (Photo: Rex Features) 
“And that was partly the reason why I gave up the Saturday Morning show.” 
“Good for you,” Piers said. “There’s more important things in life than getting up early on a Saturday morning. 
The Ready Steady Cook chef is notoriously protective of his private life. James Martin with his girlfriend Louise Davies (Photo: WireImage) 
But last year it was revealed he’s been in a five year relationship with PA Louise Davies . 
“For the first time in my life I’m content and happy,” he explained this morning. 
Explaining his exit last year, James previously said: "I didn’t think leaving Saturday Kitchen would be such a big deal. 
"I genuinely said to my agent, 'Stick it out there, but no one will be bothered,"'and next minute it was all over the papers. It was like One Direction splitting up." Like us on Facebook
